title: elevates
author: elevates
content: I am listening to People - LibiancaThe reason why I listen to this song on a loop while I work is the lyrics that clams me down as there is too much pressure to perform in my work area and this line impacts me every time this line comes up "Cause you see people...... they do not really know you". This song always makes me realize that it is me who has to take care of myself and no one will check on me.   Tell me which song you can listen to on a loop and why?

comments.author: nicolas222
comments.body: I am listen venom chorus in loop and some time also reverse because i like it too much,is a song of Eminem

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Marshmello ft. Bastille - Happier (Official Music Video) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7Bc3pLyij0If I am feeling down this song makes me feeling happier about my life. It is a song I can listen to much times in a row and I have it in my memory. It is the first song that comes to my mind. Then only for a minuteI want to change my mind'Cause this just don't feel right to meI wanna raise your spiritsI want to see you smile butKnow that means I'll have to leaveKnow that means I'll have to leaveLately, I've been, I've been thinkingI want you to be happier, I want you to be happier

comments.author: reizella28
comments.body: Left Right by XG - If you're into KPOP and want to finds a nice beat plus the voices of the group makes it sound good! I don't know if they're Korean because their lyrics are full English even their other songs!
